key_risks: Securities class action lawsuits alleging false and misleading statements
Reliance on accounts receivable securitization impacting liquidity
Supply chain vulnerabilities disrupting service delivery
Labor shortages affecting service quality and operational efficiency
Competitive pressure eroding market share and margins
controversies: Multiple class action lawsuits with claims exceeding $1 billion in shareholder losses
Allegations of underinvestment and misrepresentation during spin-off from Aramark
environmental_issues: Concerns over water and energy usage in rental and cleaning services
Potential regulatory scrutiny due to sustainability challenges
social_issues: Employee dissatisfaction due to poor work-life balance and unfair treatment
Difficulty in recruiting and retaining skilled workers
governance_issues: Misrepresentation of growth predictions leading to stock price drop
Dependence on revolving accounts receivable securitization facility

sources.title: Aramark Spinoff Vestis Hit With Shareholder Suit Over Stock Drop
sources.snippet: Aramark offshoot Vestis Corp. is facing a proposed securities class action alleging the company made false and misleading statements that cost shareholders more than $1 billion in value when the company revealed its growth predictions were wrong..
